full_summary:
### Security Guard Services for Service Canada Center in Marathon, ON


#### Summary
This Invitation to Bid (ITB) is for Security Guard Services for two (2) locations in Service Canada Center (SCC) - Marathon, Ontario. The contract will commence on December 1, 2022, and end on November 30, 2023. This announcement is Amendment #1, which includes the number of security guards required.

#### Requirement Details
The Service Canada/Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires:

*   Two (2) security guards at the Marathon location (52 Peninsula Road, Ste. 105, Marathon, ON P0T 2E0)
*   Security guard services for an estimated period of December 1, 2022, to November 30, 2023

#### Contract Information
*   Solicitation Number: 100020993-B
*   Contracting Authority: Stephanie Luedee
*   Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)

#### Bidder Eligibility
All bidders must be eligible to participate in Government of Canada procurement opportunities and must comply with the requirements outlined in the bid opportunity.

#### Important Dates
*   Amendment Date: October 13, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: October 18, 2022, at 14:00 (ET)
